
            <h1 class="postTitle">

    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">上周热点回顾（2.3-2.9）</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p>热点随笔：</p>

rel="noopener">如何在WPS和Word/Excel中直接使用DeepSeek功能</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xuxiaona/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">麻雀小妖</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/dechinphy/archive/2025/02/06/deepseek.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Ubuntu Linux部署DeepSeek</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/dechinphy/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">DECHIN</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/qubernet/archive/2025/02/07/18702147.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">通过Ollama本地部署DeepSeek R1以及简单使用的教程（超详细）</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/qubernet/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Qubernet</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/lsjwq/archive/2025/02/06/18700983.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">DeepSeek+AnythingLLM打造自己大模型知识库</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/lsjwq/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">iNeuOS工业互联网系统</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a rel="noopener">DECHIN</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/vipstone/archive/2025/02/08/18705268.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">1分钟学会DeepSeek本地部署，小白也能搞定！</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/vipstone/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">磊哥|www.javacn.site</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/javaguide/archive/2025/02/06/18701694.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">IDEA 接入 DeepSeek,太酷了!</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/javaguide/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">JavaGuide</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/shanyou/archive/2025/02/03/18697848.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">DeepSeek,你是懂.NET的！</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/shanyou/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">张善友</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/miao-zp/archive/2025/02/05/18700149.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">本地部署最强人工智能服务：方案（一）Chatbox+硅基流动（满血DeepSeek R1）</a>&nbsp;(<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/miao-zp/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">慕容木木</a>)<br>·&nbsp;<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/yexiaochai/archive/2025/02/05/18699686.html" target="_blank" target="_blank" rel="noopener">久曲健</a>)</p>
<p>热点新闻：</p>
